description: One of four films in the "Mass communications and society" series forming a case study on British politics and television, shot during the 1976 Labour and Conservative Party conferences held in Blackpool and Brighton respectively. Concentrates on the live broadcasts of the events of each day and reveals the philosophies that guide the broadcasters in their decision making. Suitable for upper secondary level.
